name: checklist

a list of things that you must think about, or that you must remember to do: I have a checklist of things that I must do today.

Add to word list
a list of things that you must remember to do or consider doing: We went over the checklist of things we had to do before leaving for South Africa.
Add to word list
Add to word list
a list of things that you must think about, or that you must remember to do: draw up/produce a checklist The department manager drew up a checklist to evaluate the performance of every employee.
